original: 扶禁、向存等率萬多人攻打，霍峻領數百人守葭萌城。圍城達一年之久，但仍不能攻下；反大破敵軍，斬向存。
text: Supporting the ban and Xiang Cun led more than 10,000 people to attack, and Huo Jun led hundreds of people to defend Jiameng City. The city was besieged for a year, but it was still unable to be captured; the enemy was defeated by the enemy, and the enemy was cut to survive.
